attributes.action: Change Elizabeth Line to The Winton line in recognition of Britain's "Schindler"
attributes.additional_details: Renaming of the cross rail line from Elizabeth Line to The Winton Line would be an appropriate recognition of the lives Sir Nicholas saved. We are request that The Minister for Transport, Mayor for London and the Queen agree to this change. A fitting tribute to a truly remarkable humanitarian
attributes.background: Sir Nicholas Winton rescued hundreds of Jewish children from Czechoslovakia in what became know as the Czech Kinder transport just prior to the second world war.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of Transport for London, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
